Welcome to ScrumWithMe.com

Agile Development is a methodology that has been implemented within many of the worlds leading tech companies and has spawned various frameworks based on a mindset that makes it easier to plan projects and build effective and successful products. ScrumWithMe.com was created by QA Analyst, Product Owner and Digital Designer, Scott McLintock, with the intention of becoming an online resourse for all things agile as well as documenting the journey to becoming a Scrum Master.
